sourcesContent: import { Dropdown, DropdownButton, Dropdow } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FunnelFill } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; function Filter({ categories, brands, onCategoryChange, onBrandChange }) { return ( Filter } > onCategoryChange("all")} classNa="fw-bold"> All Categories onCategoryChange("newArrival")}> New Arrival onCategoryChange("special")}> Special onCategoryChange("noodle")}> Noodle onCategoryChange("snack")}> Snack onCategoryChange("sauce")}> Sauce Brands {brands.map((brand) => ( onBrandChange(brand)}> {brand} ))} ); } export default Filter;
